name: ListUserCards
description:
Retrieve a list of cards owned by the account.

This tool fetches up to 25 cards associated with the user's account. It should be called when there is a need to view all cards linked to the account making the request.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string token to retrieve the next set of card results for pagination.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

See [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination) for more information.

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Limit results to cards associated with a specific customer ID. By default, all cards owned by the merchant are returned.

value_schema.description:
Limit results to cards associated with the customer supplied.
By default, all cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.name: limit_to_reference_id
parameters.description: Limit results to cards associated with the given reference ID. Use this to filter cards matching a specific reference.

value_schema.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order of the list by card creation date. Options are 'ASC' (ascending) or 'DESC' (descending). Defaults to 'ASC'.

value_schema.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.

parameters.name: include_disabled_cards
parameters.description: Include disabled cards in the results. By default, only enabled cards are returned.

value_schema.description:
Includes disabled cards.
By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.description:

By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

value_schema.description:

By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

value_schema.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

parameters.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.

value_schema.description:
